title: Tebogo Lerole hints at his future plans to marry Khanyi Mbau
text:
Tebogo Lerole hints at his future plans to marry Khanyi Mbau share this

Tebogo Lerole and Khanyi Mbau have been together for a long time and it seems the pair is ready to take things to the next level.

Taking to his Instagram page, the Kwela Tebza group member hinted at his future plans to marry the self-proclaimed Queen of Bling by posting a picture of the two dressed in matching black and white outfits (which could easily pass off as a bridal gown and wedding suit), and in the caption he let Khanyi know how she qualified to be his wife.

Read More: ‘Love is pain’ – Khanyi Mbau on her break up with Tebogo Lerole

“You have surpassed every test to become Mrs Lerole,” Tebogo captioned the post.

Not everything has been rosy for the couple, last year Khanyi disappointed many of their fans by announcing their break-up in a since-deleted heart-wrenching Instagram post. Since then the pair have reunited and are as inseparable as ever.

Read More:Why Khanyi Mbau and Tebogo got back together after their breakup

Speaking to Move!, Khanyi revealed how the two eventually got back together.

“We broke up alright but it we were comparatively civil to each other. Later on, we decided to retrace our steps trying to find our sweet spot as both individuals and people in a relationship. It was out of the prodding of Tebogo who said ‘let’s fix it (relationship), let’s work through it, don’t walk away, let’s go back to the drawing board…,” she told the publication.

And well, it seems the couple has successfully mended their relationship and we hope to be hearing wedding bells soon!
description: Tebogo Lerole and Khanyi Mbau have been together for a long time and it seems the pair is ready to take things to the next level.
